embed.title: <:MULE:1364560650487074858> Wanna get the **Mule** Role
embed.description:
**3 ways to qualify:**
1.  Already hold the **Full-Access** role on the Monad discord
2.  Invite **3 new Errands** **who also link their wallet**
3. Or **boost** the server using Discord Nitro 

Run **`/mule`** to check your current progress.
